title: China Qiandaohu Lakefront Escape with All-Day Dining Restaurant
description: Stay surrounded by spellbinding nature at voco Thousand Island Lake, an IHG Hotel, a sophisticated escape encircled by three picturesque lakes. The hotel is crafted in a Hui style of architecture that's seamlessly fused with the signature modern aesthetics of a voco stay. Spend your days swimming in the refreshing outdoor pool, and when hunger strikes make a beeline for Xia Guang, an all-day dining restaurant boasting fantastic views of Qiandao Lake and a mouthwatering menu.
location_description: voco Thousand Island Lake, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 289 Yangguang Road, Qiandaohu Town, Chun'an County, Hangzhou, 311700, China
